title: Güvenli bağlantı kurulamadı
content:
Sayın Yetkili Bu hatayı almaktayım. Yardımlarınız için şimdiden teşekkür ederim

Güvenli bağlantı kurulamadı

localhost:8543 bağlantısı sırasında bir hata oluştu. SSL izin verilen uzunluğu aşan bir kayıt aldı.

Hata kodu: SSL_ERROR_RX_RECORD_TOO_LONG 

   Görüntülemeye çalıştığınız sayfa, alınan verilerin yetkinliği doğrulanamadığı için gösterilemiyor.    Sitenin sahibiyle iletişime geçerek bu sorunu bildirmeyi deneyebilirsiniz.
creator: sandalsener

title: Firefox crashes every few minutes
content:
Hello,

Firefox, up to date version crashes every few minutes. Tried to download and run installation, tried to open in troubleshooting mode, nothing helped.


Few last crash IDs

bp-2ee2b227-57a8-42a0-965d-f948a0220615 bp-e3b9f4da-c1db-417a-a79c-e8eb50220615
creator: eddaVLN

title: Firefox Browser
content:
When I use Microsoft Edge Browser in the top row it shows my Bookmarks and to the left it also shows an icon that allows you to jump back to the Edge Browser.

In Mozilla Firefox there is no icon to take you back to the Firefox browser. Occasionally a site will Hi-Jack you and trying to use the back arrow to get back to the Browser does not work. The only solution is to shut down the Firefox browser and then restart it again.

I would rather use Firefox as it support HTML 5 audio which is not supported in Microsoft Edge.

Can you please advise.

Many thanks

Les Finch
creator: lwf41

title: How do I set my timezone to "unspecified" in Firefox?
content: I'd like to see if I can completely disable my timezone, my friend mentioned something about setting my timezone to "unspecified", is there any way I can do that within Firefox?
creator: erinjoy

title: unable to connect mozzila website nor download update
content: Hi, I use firefox for quite a long time, and in the last 10 months I have been having a very peculiar issue. I am unable to enter mozzila website on my computer using Firefox browser, nor any other browser. Because of it, I am unable to download update or contact support. To fix the problem, I had to download the Installer at work and save it to a flash USB, then install a newer version on my computer. I am currently contacting your from work. Please help me understand where the source of the problem is coming from and how to fix this block. Best regards, Tim.
creator: droxer3d

title: Hata kodu: SSL_ERROR_RX_RECORD_TOO_LONG
content:
Normal şartlarda e fatura imzalama aracını açtığımızda, bizi otomatik olarak, https://localhost:8543/

bu sayafaya atıyor ve ordan e arşiv fatura işlemlerimize devam ediyoruz. Ancak şu an sayfaya yönlendirildiğimizde bize ;

localhost:8543 bağlantısı sırasında bir hata oluştu. SSL izin verilen uzunluğu aşan bir kayıt aldı.

Hata kodu: SSL_ERROR_RX_RECORD_TOO_LONG

bu hatayı veriyor ve bu nedenle faturamızı oluşturamıyoruz. Yardımınızı rica ederim.
creator: kiymet

title: Synced Firefox browser password deleted on on One PC now deleted everywhere! HOW TO RESTORE?
content:
Hi So I had an old PC which somone wanted to use, I forgot that I was logged in on the fireforx browser so I deleted all the cookies, browser history and saved password, however forgot it was on my account so when I started using my PC today...passwords where not showing up and realised I deted them all and its now synced acoss all my devices...

Can I restore all the password?

Sayın Yetkili,

Daha önce çok kez girmiş olduğumuz firefox tarayıcı aşağıdaki hatayı almaktayım. Lütfen yardımınıza ihtiyacım var. Yardımlarınız için şimdiden çok teşekkür eder, işlerinizde başarılar dilerim.


Güvenli bağlantı kurulamadı

title: Video stops buffering and then take more time to load another seconds.
content:
Firefox version: 102.0b7 OS: Win 11

While watching videos(movies/anime) video takes much time to buffer. If video is of 20 minutes then it loads first few minutes then after watch time reaches that buffered video then it takes more time buffer.

What I am looking is for, how can I force firefox to buffer full video at once or is there any way to increase buffer size.
creator: pv8172

title: open dwf using firefox browser
content: how I can open .dwf files using the Mozilla Firefox browser?
creator: abedalraouf

title: Home page won't open on boot
content:
After last or previous update, Firefox does not load home page. Get message with last tabs:

Sorry. We’re having trouble getting your pages back.

We are having trouble restoring your last browsing session. Select Restore Session to try again.

Still not able to restore your session? Sometimes a tab is causing the issue. View previous tabs, remove the checkmark from the tabs you don’t need to recover, and then restore.

Did all this it is still happening. Last time removing some file folder did not correct. Do not want it to restore last session!

What is causing this?

James
creator: JJEULER

title: emails
content: How do I send a lager file on email? When I try it comes up 'you are about to send a msg of size 46.3MB. The size of the msg exceeds the global size limit of the server exceeds databytes limit (#5.3.4) I have zipped it still comes up the same.
creator: jannali

title: Firefox isn't loading a web page correctly
content: Firefox is not letting me get into my Paypal Mastercard account. When I attempt to log in via paypal, the account page doesn't load. Instead I'm taken back to the log in page. I thought the problem was the security setting I was the security setting I was using (Privacy Badger and Ublock Origin.) but removing them did not fix the problem.
creator: rmmcgee2

title: Cannot post on Blogger because a RECAPTCHA error keeps happening - firefox security settings to blame
content:
Hi - I am finding that since whatever recent damn Firefox update now i cant post on a blogger (blogspot.com) page as everytime i try to i get the same message that

"Could not connect to the reCAPTCHA service. Please check your internet connection and reload "

i reload and same thing happens. I saw a solution online that i have to allow cross-site tracking for this to work, however Firefox you dont give me the option to simply switch that off for this particular site from what i can see

so how to do fix this - will you rectify this problem with your security settings?
creator: mitchellnolte
